
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int test;
	cin >> test;
	for(int q=1;q<=test;q++)
	{
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        int a[n],b[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin >> a[i];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin >> b[i];
        sort(a,a+n);
        sort(b,b+n);
        int c=n-1;
        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            if(b[i]<a[c])
                c--;
            if(c<0)
                break;
        }
        c++;
        c=n-c;
        cout << c << "\n";
	}
}
